translation: Bewildered by many fancies, entangled in the snare of delusion, addicted to the gratification of lust, they fall into a foul hell.
commentary: 16.16 Bewildered by many a fancy? entangled in the snare of delusion? Attached addicted? Kamabhogeshu to the gratification of lust? fall (they) fall? Hell into hell? impure foul.Commentary Just as a man utters many incoherent words when he has delirium or high fever? so also these diabolical men prattle about their desires? sensual enjoyment? etc. They commit,countless
